Ukraine shoots down three Russian warplanes, air force chief saysUkrainian forces shot down two Russian Su-34 fighter-bombers and one Su-35 fighter in the skies over eastern Ukraine on Saturday, the country's air force chief said. Sat, 17 Feb 2024 12:17:11 GMT R43MB3PY6FKQJEODQJZDBHNIIU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-shoots-down- Three-Russian-warplanes-air-force-chief-says-2024-02-17/Reuters世界欧洲
Navalny's body is not in Salekhard morgue, says spokeswomanAlexei Navalny's spokeswoman on Saturday said his body was not in the morgue in Salekhard, the town near to the prison colony where Navalny died on Friday. Sat, 17 Feb 2024 11:44:04 GMT G53WNGVNXBIIPNY5LG5WRPCMBQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/navalnys-body-is-not-salekhard-morgue-says-spokeswoman-2024-02-17/Reuters世界欧洲
Stop whining about Trump and focus on Europe's interests, Dutch PM saysOutgoing Dutch Prime Minister Mark Rutte, the frontrunner to be the next secretary-general of NATO, said on Saturday that Europe should stop whining about Donald Trump and focus instead on what it could do for Ukraine. Sat, 17 Feb 2024 11:27:20 GMT LXVOBH2A4VIRDGKMKVCFFMZWQ4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/stop-whining-about-trump-focus-europes-interests-dutch-pm-says-2024-02-17/John Irish世界欧洲
Israeli stages airstrikes across Gaza, makes arrests at hospitalIsraeli forces carried out arrests in Gaza's largest functioning hospital, health officials and the military said on Saturday, as airstrikes hit across the enclave and rain battered Palestinians taking shelter in Rafah. Sat, 17 Feb 2024 11:22:59 GMT DDG76L4YYZPITLS53DM7JRXLUQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israeli-stages-airstrikes-across-gaza-makes-arrests-hospital-2024-02-17/Nidal Al-Mughrabi, Maayan Lubell世界中东
Only morgue in Salekhard, Russia, has not received Navalny's body - employee tells ReutersAlexei Navalny's body has not arrived at the only morgue in Salekhard, the town near to the prison colony where Navalny died, an employee told Reuters by phone on Saturday. Sat, 17 Feb 2024 11:20:36 GMT JH23BGLD4JL6VL7UR4RHQUK2AY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/only-morgue-salekhard- Russia-has-not-received-navalnys-body-employee-tells-2024-02-17/Reuters世界欧洲
Navalny aide confirms his death, unclear where his body is in Arctic Russian regionAlexei Navalny's spokeswoman confirmed on Saturday that Russia's most prominent opposition leader was dead but said it was unclear where his body had been taken as a morgue close to the Arctic prison where he died said it had not received the body. Sat, 17 Feb 2024 10:53:49 GMT WHWAMQRLL5PJPIMSQ6AN6I6ZOI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/alexei-navalny-is-dead-spokeswoman-confirms-2024-02-17/Reuters世界欧洲
Sudan's army claims first major advanceThe Sudanese army has claimed its first major advance in 10 months of war, regaining control of part of the city of Omdurman from the Rapid Support Forces. Sat, 17 Feb 2024 10:47:46 GMT M6YLSY5UPRJTNLCEH46XQ3GCPM https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/sudans-army-claims-first-major-advance-2024-02-17/Reuters世界非洲
G7 foreign ministers observe a minute's silence for NavalnyG7 foreign ministers observed a minute's silence at the start of their meeting in Munich on Saturday to pay their respects to Russian opposition leader Alexei Navalny who died in prison on Friday, the G7's Italian presidency said. Sat, 17 Feb 2024 10:44:16 GMT DBHWPBDMHVJRPHI7FZFAQUVDZ4 https://www.reuters.com/world/g7-foreign-ministers-observe-ministers-silence-navalny-2024-02-17/Reuters世界
European Commission outlines upcoming defence strategy proposalThe European Commission will present a defence industrial strategy proposal in three weeks, commission president Ursula von der Leyen said on Saturday, and will also open a defence innovation office in Ukraine. Sat, 17 Feb 2024 10:35:42 GMT NIHSZVVC3FLZFN3DQGH67EUULQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/european-commission-present-defence-proposal-3-weeks-2024-02-17/Julia Payne世界欧洲
Insight: Surging cocaine violence has Uruguay clamoring for DEA helpUruguay's main port received two cargo scanners sixteen years ago to detect drugs and other suspicious loads. Unfortunately, during delivery one of them fell into the sea. Sat, 17 Feb 2024 10:08:54 GMT J36QMXOE7FIOBMSNNITTLWAN5Y https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/surging-cocaine-violence-has-uruguay-clamoring-dea-help-2024-02-17/Gabriel Stargardter, Lucinda Elliott世界美洲
Talk of European nuclear deterrent 'not helpful', says NATO's StoltenbergTalk of a potential European nuclear deterrent that would not involve the United States is "not helpful", NATO Secretary General Jens Stoltenberg said on Saturday. Sat, 17 Feb 2024 10:05:08 GMT ZWUHO4YNOJPH7BJV57NKS46NNM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/talk-european-nuclear-deterrent-not-helpful-says-natos-stoltenberg-2024-02-17/Reuters世界欧洲
